South Korea opposition leader leaves ICU after knife attack - surgeonSouth Korea's opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung was out of intensive care and was recovering from surgery to repair a major vein that was sliced in a knife attack two days ago, a surgeon who operated on him said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:47:24 GMT OZNQ3PL3XBJZ5MFHVYPXFNOZ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-opposition-leader-leaves-icu-after-knife-attack-surgeon-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
As Japan's Wajima city digs out from quake, hopes fade for tourism recoveryHotel chef Makoto Wakabayashi was among those in Wajima hoping for a banner year as visitors returned to the scenic, seaside town that weathered more than two years of pandemic gloom. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:32:41 GMT 44KN4H3L7NJVZANNAHNWBQ7BL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japans-wajima-city-digs-out-quake-hopes-fade-tourism-recovery-2024-01-04/Kiyoshi Takenaka世界亚太地区
Japan's cabinet to approve reserved funds for earthquake aid next week -PMJapan's cabinet will approve next week the use of its reserved funds to cover damages from this week's massive earthquake in its west, Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:28:17 GMT HMRIYUUCPBJN3FF3SKK6YWDKOM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japans-cabinet-approve-reserved-funds-earthquake-aid-next-week-pm-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan spots more Chinese balloons, says one flew over islandTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected three more Chinese balloons flying across the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, and one of those flew over the island, the second day in a row it has reported such activity. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:21:03 GMT GQ4KE3E56JKGZLDYIZS6PTFYLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-spots-more-chinese-balloons-says-one-flew-over-island-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea, US conduct week-long firing drills near North Korea borderSouth Korean and U.S. troops have conducted joint combat firing drills near the border with North Korea involving heavy weapons, as Pyongyang lambasted the allies for dangerous moves pushing the region to the brink of "an inferno of nuclear war." Thu, 04 Jan 2024 02:49:41 GMT GWZE7JOVZRJ7NL23GNF5MBGCCU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-us-conduct-week-long-firing-drills-near-north-korea-border-2024-01-04/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Chinese provinces warn of thick fog, dozens of Shanghai flights delayedExtremely heavy fog in several Chinese provinces on Thursday led to dangerously low visibility, closing highways, delaying flights out of Shanghai and prompting weather forecasters to release a string of warnings and advisories. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 02:17:20 GMT VP3QD7VF4BLDVCYN7VJVTGMHAU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-provinces-warn-thick-fog-dozens-shanghai-flights-delayed-2024-01-04/Bernard Orr世界中国
Taiwan will publish analysis of China's alleged election interference post voteTaiwan is documenting its experiences with China's alleged attempts to interfere in elections next week and will publish its analysis soon after the vote. Former Harvard head said she was called 'N-word,' got death threatsFormer Harvard President Claudine Gay said she received emailed death threats and was called the "N-word" countless times prior to resigning after her congressional testimony on antisemitism and plagiarism allegations. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 00:56:26 GMT 7HXTEPV3KBKWHHP7CWJGD6MR44 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/former-harvard-head-said-she-was- Called-n-word-got-death-threats-2024-01-04/Reuters世界美国
US education official resigns over Biden's Israel-Gaza policyA senior official in the U.S. Education Department stepped down on Wednesday, citing President Joe Biden's handling of the conflict in Gaza, the latest sign of dissent in the administration as deaths continue to grow in the war. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 00:55:08 GMT GPG5TTY6WJOWDGHDAHTUMA62EQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-education-official-resigns-over-bidens-israel-gaza-policy-2024-01-04/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Japan quake rescuers race against time as survival limit nearsThousands of rescuers pressed on in their search for survivors of a New Year's Day quake that killed at least 77 people in Japan, hoping to save as many as they can within a three day survival window which ends on Thursday afternoon. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 00:27:16 GMT CXGMQMDG75KQ7MF2D25YIZZ2FA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-quake-death-toll-rises-73-search-survivors-enters-fourth-day-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Argentina court suspends Milei's 'mega-decree' labor reformsA top Argentine court on Wednesday suspended a package of labor reforms decreed by new President Javier Milei last month, after the nation's largest union filed an injunction. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 22:43:34 GMT COARZIUGJJP25HX5F7PVOJNMRE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-court-suspends-mileis-mega-decree-labor-reforms-2024-01-03/Reuters世界美洲
